item.title: tools
item.description: nginx-proxy / nginx-proxy Automated nginx proxy for Docker containers using docker-gen neo4j bun deno mingrammer / diagrams getsentry / self-hosted macaron Macaron is an open-source UI design tool to create and maintain Web Components. Create components visually and use them with any framework, or with vanilla HTML/JavaScript. streamlit Streamlit turns data scripts into shareable web apps in minutes.
